Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.MiniController

Interface MiniController

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseMiniController, CanEndMiniController, CheckDomeMiniController, ChosenMiniController, MoreCheckMiniController, OrderMiniController, PickGodMiniController, ServerMoveMiniController, StandardMiniController
public interface MiniController
This interface creates every class that allows to parse the input of the user directly on the client, without using the server

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean checkPos​(java.lang.String input, PlaySpace playSpace, java.lang.StringBuilder stringBuilder)
    This method parses the input
    boolean checkPosGui​(java.lang.String input, PlaySpace playSpace, java.lang.StringBuilder stringBuilder)
    Same thing for checkPos above, for GUI
    java.lang.String getMessage​(java.lang.String input)  
    java.lang.String getMessageGui​(java.lang.String message)
    Same thing as getMessage above, for the GUI

  • Method Details

    • checkPos

      boolean checkPos​(java.lang.String input, PlaySpace playSpace, java.lang.StringBuilder stringBuilder)
      This method parses the input
      Parameters:
      input - a string passed from user
      playSpace - The playspace where to search for the position
      stringBuilder - a string placeholder to return the correct message to the player
      Returns:
      true or false whether certain conditions are satisfied or not

    • getMessage

      java.lang.String getMessage​(java.lang.String input)
      Parameters:
      input - string passed from user
      Returns:
      the input

    • getMessageGui

      java.lang.String getMessageGui​(java.lang.String message)
      Same thing as getMessage above, for the GUI
      Parameters:
      message - string passed from user
      Returns:
      the message passed as parameter

    • checkPosGui

      boolean checkPosGui​(java.lang.String input, PlaySpace playSpace, java.lang.StringBuilder stringBuilder)
      Same thing for checkPos above, for GUI
      Parameters:
      input - a string passed from user
      playSpace - The playspace where to search for the position
      stringBuilder - a string placeholder to return the correct message to the player
      Returns:
      true or false whether certain conditions are satisfied or not
